Module footballtournamentapplication
Package controller

Class GroupController

java.lang.Object
controller.GroupController
public class GroupController extends Object
GroupController class that stores football clubs and generates groups.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAll(ArrayList<FootballClub> footballClubsToAdd)
    Method for adding a list of football clubs to the groupcontroller
    void
    addFootballClub(String name, String nationality)
    Method for adding a football club
    boolean
    generateGroups()
    Method for generating groups Iterates through the clubs that have been added to the tournament and divides them into two list according to their nationality It then randomizes the order to make the draw unpredictable Then the groups are generated, with the requirements of 1 foreign and 3 norwegian teams

    • addFootballClub

      public void addFootballClub(String name, String nationality) throws RuntimeException
      Method for adding a football club
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the football club
      nationality - Nationality of the football club (Either norwegian or foreign)
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if more then 64 teams, or no name or nationality is given

    • addAll

      public void addAll(ArrayList<FootballClub> footballClubsToAdd) throws RuntimeException
      Method for adding a list of football clubs to the groupcontroller
      Parameters:
      footballClubsToAdd - a list of football clubs
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if trying to add more then 64 teams total

    • resetList

      public void resetList()
      resets the arraylists witch store footballclub and group data used when deleting all data before load

    • generateGroups

      public boolean generateGroups()
      Method for generating groups Iterates through the clubs that have been added to the tournament and divides them into two list according to their nationality It then randomizes the order to make the draw unpredictable Then the groups are generated, with the requirements of 1 foreign and 3 norwegian teams
      Returns:
      true when finished
